attributes.action: scrap penalty points and replace with fines .just like the rest of europe !!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to scrap penalty points to stop drivers losing there licence for small !! mishaps !! too include speeding upto 100mph replace with fines just like the rest of europe( except italy) and straight bans i.e. drink driving,drug driving,killing somebody whilst incharge of a vechicle. at the moment we pay fines then get points .!! Then the insurance companies take the chunk!! please bring us in to line with the rest of europe with a system of fines and bans !!!
